DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test two regimens of mifegyne and cytotec for medical abortion. The investigators hypothesize that administration of both medications during one hospital visit will not compromise effectiveness.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Regimens for Mifegyne and Cytotec
DOC.criteria: above age 18, for whom Mifegyne and cytotec are indicated. inflammation of oral cavity.
